movie.title: Adoration
movie.description_intro: 12-year-old Paul lives an isolated existence with his mother, who works at a private psychiatric hospital in the woods near their house. One day, Paul encounters a young teen named Gloria, a mysterious new patient with whom he quickly becomes infatuated. As the fledgling pair forge a tentative friendship, Gloria convinces Paul to help her escape. But when they embark on a perilous journey together, his devotion is put to the test as Gloria's dangerous unpredictability gradually starts to surface.
movie.description_full: 12-year-old Paul lives an isolated existence with his mother, who works at a private psychiatric hospital in the woods near their house. One day, Paul encounters a young teen named Gloria, a mysterious new patient with whom he quickly becomes infatuated. As the fledgling pair forge a tentative friendship, Gloria convinces Paul to help her escape. But when they embark on a perilous journey together, his devotion is put to the test as Gloria's dangerous unpredictability gradually starts to surface.

movies.title: Occupation
movies.summary: After their small Australian country town is annihilated by an overwhelming airborne attack, a group of civilians evade capture and discover they are now among the last remaining survivors of an extraterrestrial invasion engulfing the entire planet. As humanity falls under world-wide occupation, they form a home-grown army to fight back against vastly superior enemy forces. On the front lines of the battle for Earth, they are our last hope.

movies.title: Tangerine
movies.summary: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.
movies.description_full: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

movies.title: Documenteur
movies.summary: A young French woman, separated from her lover, tries to find a lodging in L.A. for herself and her son.
movies.description_full: A young French woman, separated from her lover, tries to find a lodging in L.A. for herself and her son.

movies.title: Emperor
movies.summary: An escaped slave travels north and has chance encounters with Frederick Douglass and John Brown. Based on the life story of Shields Green.
